summary: Margot, a mother-of-three who works as a secretary at an Import's company is summoned to work as a secret agent with the codename "Rose" forming a funny duo with the handsome spy FX.
cast: Claire Keim|Lannick Gautry|Serge Hazanavicius|Florence Pernel|Yvan Le Bolloc'h|Amanda Lear|Nadège Beausson-Diagne|Lucien Belvès|Bruno Canredon|Matthieu Letellier|Nathan Lourenço|Régis Lux|Leïla Macaire|Julien Masdoua|Éric Naggar|Laurent Spielvogel|Kader Lassina Touré
title: Nombre en clave: Rose
